channel.title: Make npc talk to you
channel.description: I need help making the Lumbridge Guide talk to me, I think I've been doing it right but every time I click "Talk-to" he won't say anything.

item.title: Make npc talk to you
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

Npc = Non-player character and dialogue is: talking, chatting written down conversation etc. Like if you write a movie script, when you write what someone is going to say in the movie or a conversation that’s a dialogue.

so a Non-player character conversation basically is what it is.

Read full topic

item.title: Make npc talk to you
item.dc:creator: @kilop kilop
item.description:
@kilop wrote:

Thanks so much, but what is a npcdialogue?

Read full topic

item.title: Make npc talk to you
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

I’m not sure which one you’re assigning to the guide, but i’ll show you how to assign it to a NPC.
First:
We go to client.java and use ctrl+f to search for case 155: this is the first click method so when you click the npc it’ll talk to them. Find something like if(NPCID == 1597){ NpcDialogue = 118; NpcDialogueSend = false; }
for example under that add if(NPCID == *NPC ID here*){ NpcDialogue = *the case you have for the dialogue you want*; NpcDialogueSend = false; }
That’s all there is to it. Hope I helped.

Read full topic

item.title: Make npc talk to you
item.dc:creator: @kilop kilop
item.description:
@kilop wrote:

I put this in my client.java

case 95: talk("Hello and welcome to Kilop-Scape, it's always good to see new faces.", 2244); break; case 96: talk("When you start off, you could always type ::shops or just teleport home.", 2244); break; case 97: talk("All the skills work too! Just go to 'Skilling Area' in your mage book.", 2244); break; case 98: talk("Will you help Kilop-Scape reach #1 server out?", 2244); break; case 99: choice("Yes.", "No."); break; case 100: talk("Okay, we do need more pkers on this server, so when you're ready, go pk!", 2244); break; case 101: talk("You could always thieve at home, or at the 'Skilling Area' in your mage book.", 2244); break; case 102: talk("So, I hope you enjoy your stay on Kilop-Scape!", 2244); break; case 103: talk("Do you think that you'll like Kilop-Scape?", 2244); break; case 104: choice("Yes.", "No."); break;

Read full topic
